title: Consular processing appointments
dataVerified: Full name, case number, NVC case number, appointment date/time/location, embassy/consulate
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Appointment status (scheduled/completed/administrative processing). Link to NVC/embassy system (applicant only, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake consular appointments. Domain binding verifies embassy/NVC. Immigrant visa interview proof. Case status verification. DS-260 processing documentation. Prevents appointment fraud.
